msgSnippet: I don t think any of Atlassian s or Cenqua s products are based on open source. They have both always been very friendly towards open source projects though

Subject: Re: [junit] code coverage tool Java
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=215576703


I don't think any of Atlassian's or Cenqua's products are based on open
source. They have both always been very friendly towards open source
projects though and I see no reason why they would change that. I
think they also offer some personal editions of some of their software
which again I suspect they will continue to do.

Paul.

jason r tibbetts wrote:
> 
> Greg,
> 
>  > (and clover has just been purchased by Atlassian - the makers of JIRA,
>  > Confluence, Bamboo - and they have a lot of motivation to improve the
>  > product further!)
> 
> I hope that their motivation != charging $$$ for what was formerly a
> free product.
>
subject: Re: [junit] code coverage tool Java
